summary.span: 提供從 SQL Server 資料庫中讀取順向資料流資料列的方式。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of rows from a SQL Server database.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立，您必須呼叫方法物件，而不是直接使用建構函式。To create a , you must call the method of the object, instead of directly using a constructor. 雖然正在使用中，相關聯忙於處理，並可對任何其他作業以外關閉它。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving the , and no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 此情況下，直到方法的呼叫。This is the case until the method of the is called. 比方說，您無法擷取輸出參數，直到您呼叫之後。For example, you cannot retrieve output parameters until after you call . 結果集，另一個處理序或執行緒正在讀取資料時所做的變更可能會顯示給使用者，是`SqlDataReader`。Changes made to a result set by another process or thread while data is being read may be visible to the user of the `SqlDataReader`. 不過，精確的行為取決於時間點。However, the precise behavior is timing dependent. 並是您可以呼叫之後的唯一屬性已關閉。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed. 雖然可能會存取屬性雖然存在，一定要呼叫傳回的值之前以確保正確的傳回值。Although the property may be accessed while the exists, always call before returning the value of to guarantee an accurate return value. 使用循序存取時 ()，則若系統將產生位置進階和另一個讀取上一個資料行上嘗試執行作業。When using sequential access (), an will be raised if the position is advanced and another read operation is attempted on the previous column. > [!NOTE] > 為了達到最佳效能，可避免建立不必要的物件，或進行不必要資料的複本。For optimal performance, avoids creating unnecessary objects or making unnecessary copies of data. 因此，多個呼叫方法這類傳回相同物件的參考。Therefore, multiple calls to methods such as return a reference to the same object. 如果您要修改這類方法所傳回的物件的基礎值特別小心。Use caution if you are modifying the underlying value of the objects returned by methods such as . ## Examples 下列範例會建立，則，和。The following example creates a , a , and a . 此範例會讀取資料，並將它寫出至主控台視窗。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console window. 程式碼接著會關閉。The code then closes the . 結尾的自動關閉`using`程式碼區塊。The is closed automatically at the end of the `using` code block. summary.span: 關閉 物件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須明確呼叫方法，當您透過使用相關聯用於其他用途。You must explicitly call the method when you are through using the to use the associated for any other purpose. `Close`方法會填滿輸出參數、 傳回值的值與`RecordsAffected`，增加關閉所花費的時間`SqlDataReader`用來處理大型或複雜的查詢。The `Close` method fills in the values for output parameters, return values and `RecordsAffected`, increasing the time that it takes to close a `SqlDataReader` that was used to process a large or complex query. 當傳回值和查詢所影響的記錄數目就不重要，關閉所花費的時間`SqlDataReader`可藉由呼叫來降低方法的相關聯物件，再呼叫`Close`方法。When the return values and the number of records affected by a query are not significant, the time that it takes to close the `SqlDataReader` can be reduced by calling the method of the associated object before calling the `Close` method. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫`Close`或是`Dispose`連線、 DataReader 或在任何其他 managed 的物件上`Finalize`您類別的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該僅釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立，則`SqlCommand`，和。The following example creates a , a `SqlCommand`, and a . 此範例會讀取資料，並將它寫出至主控台視窗。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console window. 程式碼接著會關閉。The code then closes the . 結尾的自動關閉`using`程式碼區塊。The is closed automatically at the end of the `using` code block. remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行查詢的本質上，不會傳回資料列 （例如刪除查詢），設定設為 0。Executing a query that, by its nature, does not return rows (such as a DELETE query), sets to 0. 不過。However. 這不應該混淆與的查詢會傳回 0 個資料列 (例如 SELECT \* FROM*表格*WHERE 1 = 2） 在此情況下在資料表中，包括隱藏的欄位傳回的資料行數目。this should not be confused with a query that returns 0 rows (such as SELECT \* FROM *table* WHERE 1 = 2) in which case returns the number of columns in the table, including hidden fields. 使用 以排除隱藏欄位。Use to exclude hidden fields.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用位元組的數。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大多數情況下這是欄位的實際長度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的長度，則為 true 如果`GetBytes`已經使用來取得位元組的欄位。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if `GetBytes` has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 這種情況下，比方說，如果可能讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < `SequentialAccess` 設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果您傳遞的緩衝區`null`，傳回整個欄位的長度，以位元組為單位，而非剩餘大小緩衝區的位移參數為基礎。If you pass a buffer that is `null`, returns the length of the entire field in bytes, not the remaining size based on the buffer offset parameter. 不會進行轉換;因此，擷取的資料必須已經是位元組陣列。No conversions are performed; therefore, the data retrieved must already be a byte array.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetOrdinal(string name) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetOrdinal (name As String) As Integer

param.name: name
param.span: 資料行名稱。

summary.span: 提供資料行的名稱，取得資料行序數。

span.span: Gets the column ordinal, given the name of the column.

returns.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `GetOrdinal` 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。`GetOrdinal` performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失敗，第二個，就會發生不區分大小寫的搜尋 (不區分大小寫的比較是使用資料庫定序)。If it fails, a second, case-insensitive search occurs (a case-insensitive comparison is done using the database collation). 比較會受到特定文化特性的大小寫規則，就會發生非預期的結果。Unexpected results can occur when comparisons are affected by culture-specific casing rules. 例如，在土耳其文，下列範例會產生錯誤的結果因為土耳其文中的檔案系統不會使用語言大小寫規則，以字母 'i' 中 「 檔案 」。For example, in Turkish, the following example yields the wrong results because the file system in Turkish does not use linguistic casing rules for the letter 'i' in "file". 方法會擲回`IndexOutOfRange`例外狀況，如果找不到的以零為起始的資料行序數。The method throws an `IndexOutOfRange` exception if the zero-based column ordinal is not found. `GetOrdinal` 假名寬度是不區分大小寫的。`GetOrdinal` is kana-width insensitive. 因為根據序數進行查閱比具名查閱更有效率，很效率不佳，呼叫`GetOrdinal`迴圈內。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call `GetOrdinal` within a loop. 節省時間，藉由呼叫`GetOrdinal`一次，並將結果指派給整數變數以便使用於迴圈。Save time by calling `GetOrdinal` once and assigning the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 針對方法會傳回有關每個資料行的中繼資料，以下列順序：For the method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 資料行DataReader column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|如果取用者可以設定為 null 值的資料行，或提供者無法判斷取用者是否可以設定為 null 值的資料行設定。Set if the consumer can set the column to a null value or if the provider cannot determine whether the consumer can set the column to a null value. 否則，不設定。Otherwise, not set. 資料行可能包含 null 值，即使它不能設為 null 的值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |BaseCatalogNameBaseCatalogName|包含資料行的資料存放區中的類別目錄名稱。The name of the catalog in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底目錄名稱，則為 NULL。NULL if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|在資料存放區中的資料行名稱。The name of the column in the data store. 這可能是不同的資料行名稱傳回 [ColumnName] 欄中原先使用別名。This might be different than the column name returned in the ColumnName column if an alias was used. 如果無法判斷基底資料行名稱，或如果資料列集資料行衍生而來但不是完全相同，資料中的資料行存放區，則為 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|包含資料行的資料存放區中的結構描述名稱。The name of the schema in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底結構描述名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base schema name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseServerNameBaseServerName|所使用的 Microsoft SQL server 執行個體名稱。The name of the instance of Microsoft SQL Server used by the .| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|資料表或檢視中包含之資料行的資料存放區的名稱。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底資料表名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 值。The default of this column is a null value.| |ColumnNameColumnName|資料行的名稱這可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果無法判別，則會傳回 null 值。If this cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 這個名稱永遠會反映最近的目前檢視] 或 [命令文字中的資料行重新命名。This name always reflects the most recent renaming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|資料行以零為起始的序數。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此資料行不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|資料行中值的最大可能長度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 使用固定長度資料類型的資料行，這是資料類型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type. 針對`nvarchar(MAX)`， `varchar(MAX)`，和`varbinary(MAX)`資料行儲存在 SQL Server 資料庫，大小上限是 2 GB。For `nvarchar(MAX)`, `varchar(MAX)`, and `varbinary(MAX)` columns stored in a SQL Server database, the maximum size is 2GB. 如果這些資料行儲存及存取檔案，最大大小限制是由檔案系統。If these columns are stored and accessed as files, the limit on maximum size is imposed by the file system. 此值變更時使用`Type System Version`連接字串中的關鍵字。This value changes when using the `Type System Version` keyword in the connection string. 新類型，它們會表示為舊版型別。For new types they are represented as downlevel types. MAX 資料類型傳回的一般 4k `nvarchar` 8000 `varchar`。The MAX data types return the normal 4k for `nvarchar` and 8000 for `varchar`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [TRANSACT-SQL 參考](/sql/t-sql/language-reference)。For more information, see the [Transact-SQL reference](/sql/t-sql/language-reference).| |DataTypeNameDataTypeName|傳回字串，表示指定的資料行的資料類型。Returns a string representing the data type of the specified column.| |IsAliasedIsAliased|`true`： 資料行名稱會是別名。`true`: The column name is an alias.

`false`： 資料行名稱不是別名。`false`: The column name is not an alias.| |IsAutoIncrementIsAutoIncrement|`true`: 資料行至新的資料列，以固定遞增方式指派值。`true`: The column assigns values to new rows in fixed increments.

`false`: 資料行不會以新的資料列，以固定遞增方式指派值。`false`: The column does not assign values to new rows in fixed increments. 此資料行的預設值是`false`。The default of this column is `false`.| |IsColumnSetIsColumnSet|`true`: 資料行是疏鬆資料行的資料行集的成員。`true`: The column is a sparse column that is a member of a column set.| |IsExpressionIsExpression|`true`: 資料行是運算式。`true`: The column is an expression.

`false`: 資料行不是運算式。`false`: The column is not an expression.| |IsHiddenIsHidden|`true`： 隱藏資料行。`true`: The column is hidden.

`false`: 資料行不會隱藏。`false`: The column is not hidden.| |IsIdentityIsIdentity|`true`: 資料行是識別資料行。`true`: The column is an identity column.

`false`: 資料行不是識別資料行。`false`: The column is not an identity column.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`： 資料行是一組資料列集中的資料行的其中一個，結合起來，可唯一識別資料列。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 使用的資料行集中`IsKey`設定為`true`必須唯一識別資料列集中的資料列。The set of columns with `IsKey` set to `true` must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 沒有這個資料行集是資料行的最少的需求。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 這組資料行可能會產生來自基底資料表主索引鍵、 唯一條件約束或唯一索引。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint or a unique index.

`false`: 資料行不是需要唯一識別資料列。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |IsLongIsLong|`true`： 此資料行包含二進位長物件 (BLOB)，其中包含很長的資料。`true`: The column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data. 非常長資料的定義是特定提供者。The definition of very long data is provider-specific.

`false`: 資料行不包含二進位長物件 (BLOB)，其中包含很長的資料。`false`: The column does not contain a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data.| |IsReadOnlyIsReadOnly|`true`： 無法修改資料行。`true`: The column cannot be modified.

`false`: 您可以修改資料行。`false`: The column can be modified.| |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|`true`: 資料行都包含永續性資料列識別碼，不能寫入，而且沒有有意義值除了身分識別資料列。`true`: The column contains a persistent row identifier that cannot be written to, and has no meaningful value except to identity the row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。A case-sensitive lookup is performed first. 如果失敗，就會建立第二個不區分大小寫的搜尋 (不區分大小寫的比較是使用資料庫定序)。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made (a case-insensitive comparison is done using the database collation). 比較會受到特定文化特性的大小寫規則，就會發生非預期的結果。Unexpected results can occur when comparisons are affected by culture-specific casing rules. 例如，在土耳其文，下列範例會產生錯誤的結果因為土耳其文中的檔案系統不會使用語言大小寫規則，以字母 'i' 中 「 檔案 」。For example, in Turkish, the following example yields the wrong results because the file system in Turkish does not use linguistic casing rules for the letter 'i' in "file". 這個方法會區分假名寬度。This method is kana-width insensitive.

The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會用來判斷 中有多少欄位是可見的。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，部分主索引鍵上的 SELECT 會傳回索引鍵的剩餘部分做為隱藏欄位。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隱藏欄位永遠會附加在可見欄位之後。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
